net.sourceforge.argparse4j.inf.ArgumentGroup

    net.sourceforge.argparse4j.inf

    • Uses of ArgumentGroup in net.sourceforge.argparse4j.inf

      Methods in net.sourceforge.argparse4j.inf that return ArgumentGroup 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArgumentGroup ArgumentParser.addArgumentGroup(String title)
      Creates new ArgumentGroup object and adds to this parser and returns the object.
      ArgumentGroup ArgumentGroup.description(String description)
      Sets description to customize help message of this group.

    • Uses of ArgumentGroup in net.sourceforge.argparse4j.internal

      Classes in net.sourceforge.argparse4j.internal that implement ArgumentGroup 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArgumentGroupImpl
      The application code must not use this class directly. This class implements both mutually exclusive group and just a conceptual group.
